## Transport.on() method

Add listener for connection events.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
on(event: "connected" | "disconnected" | "transportError", listener: () => void): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  event | <code>&quot;connected&quot; &#124; &quot;disconnected&quot; &#124; &quot;transportError&quot;</code> |  |
|  listener | <code>() =&gt; void</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`this`
